Sub: 
Procedure for entry of waitlisted passengers at airports. 
 
Keeping in view the inconvenience faced by waitlisted passengers, it has been 
decided that waitlisted passengers may be allowed to enter departure area of the terminal  
building upto check-in counter for getting confirmation of their tickets from the concerned 
airlines. If any person is found indulging  in touting or any other unlawful activity inside the 
terminal building the APSU shall take action against him as per law. 
 
 
(R.C. Tayal) 
Offg. Commissioner of Security (CA)
